dcterms:creator: T. Hong
P. Pinson
S. Fan
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of four and half years of historical hourly load data from 1/1/2004 to 6/30/2008 for 20 zones plus an aggregated zone marked as zone 21.
dcterms:title: Global Energy Forecasting Competition 2012 Load Data

dcterms:creator: T. Hong
P. Pinson
S. Fan
H. Zareipour
A. Troccoli
R. J. Hyndman
dcterms:description: The dataset includes weather variables like irradiance, temperature, wind speed, and other relevant variables used as inputs to the forecasting model along with additional variables such as day of the week, the month of the year, the hour of the day.
dcterms:title: Global Energy Forecasting Competition 2014 Solar Data

dcterms:creator: T. Hong
P. Pinson
S. Fan
H. Zareipour
A. Troccoli
R. J. Hyndman
dcterms:description: The dataset contains three years of hourly solar generation and corresponding weather data from 4/01/2012 to 04/06/2014.
dcterms:title: Global Energy Forecasting Competition 2014 PV Data
